already_acocunt: Do you already have an account?
email.recover_password_text: We have received a request to recover the password for {{email}}. To continue, please click the following link
email.welcome: Welcome to Disruptivo, activate your account
factory_payments_body: From online stores to platforms or marketplaces, we offer a full range of solutions for all your payment needs.
how_make_payment:
Copy or scan You can copy the address that appears at the top and send it from your preferred exchange.
Important Only send USDT.TRC20 (Tron Network) in the exact amount. If you send to any other network, your funds will be lost.
important_message_pay: By clicking on GO TO PAY, you will be redirected to another page depending on the payment method. If this is the first time you are making such a payment, it is important that you read the instructions before making the payment.
invalid_credentials: The credentials provided are incorrect, please try again
invalid_password: The password provided is incorrect. Please try again
name: Name and Surname
not_enough_money: We will send you a message or you can send the remaining amount to the address above.
not_found_mail: The provided email is not registered
not_received_mail_mail: If you didn't receive the email, check your spam or junk mail folder
platform_body: Accept payments and transfer money worldwide with Disruptivo's powerful APIs and software solutions designed to help you generate more revenue.
platform_title: A Complete Payment Platform Designed to Grow
powerfull_to_break_lines: You have the power. Let's break limits and achieve your dreams together.
quick_integration_body: Our solutions for all types of businesses allow Capital Payments to be integrated in minutes.
quick_payments_body: Receive your money in minutes, Disruptivo is the platform that drives your business
quick_start_body: Create an account online in minutes and use our libraries and SDK to securely accept payments. We will deposit your funds directly into your cold Wallet or, if you prefer, to a specific wallet.
recover_password_mail: We have sent an email to %{email} that you can access your account
security_body: All your data is protected because it is encrypted; only you have the power to use your money.
sent_all_amount: Make sure to send the exact amount of USDT.TRC20 your payment order is
testimony: I created my account at Disruptivo, and now I receive my money faster
testimony_payments: I have my account at Disruptivo, and now I receive my money faster and without KYC
welcome_how_to_feel: How would you feel if you had more control over your money?
whatsapp_default_message: Hello! We are writing to you from Disruptivo
